<<<<<<< HEAD
Two sermons preached at Cambridge the first at the Lent assizes, 1654, the other on the yearly commemoration of Dr. Andrew Pern, 1655 / by J. Clerk. Clarke, Joshua.
[4], 28, 30 p.
Printed by the printers to the Universitie and are to be sold by William Mordens, Cambridge [Cambridgeshire] : 1655.
Each sermon has separate t.p. and paging. Reproduction of the original in the British Library. The magistrates ministery--The faithfull steward.
=======
